about: Mid-level Software Engineer with 6 years of experience delivering production-ready mobile and backend systems using React Native, JavaScript, and AWS. Brings an additional 5 years of senior-level automation experience, with deep expertise in CI/CD, performance testing, and reliability engineering. Strong end-to-end engineer with proven ability across frontend, backend, cloud infrastructure, and observability in fast-paced product environments.

employments.title: Software Engineer
key_duties: Design, develop and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using React Native for iOS and Android
Build reusable UI components, manage complex state, and implement scalable frontend architecture
Develop backend functionality using AWS Lambda and API Gateway within a serverless environment
Integrate frontend applications with secure, well-documented REST APIs
Configure and maintain Datadog dashboards, logging and alerting for production monitoring
Participate in code reviews, technical discussions and architectural decisions
Work closely with product managers, designers and backend engineers throughout the delivery lifecycle

employments.title: T-Shaped Developer
key_duties: Worked across both software development and QA, supporting React features and automation frameworks
Contributed to mobile, web and backend development initiatives
Improved automation coverage and reliability using Selenium, WebdriverIO and Cypress
Acted as a bridge between developers and QA engineers during releases

employments.title: Software Developer in Test
key_duties: Designed and maintained automation frameworks for API, Web UI and Mobile applications
Led migration of Selenium-based test suites to Cypress
Integrated automation into CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins
Investigated flaky tests and production issues, performing root-cause analysis
Mentored junior QA engineers and supported technical interviews

employments.title: Software Developer in Test
key_duties: Built automation frameworks from scratch for UI, API and Mobile platforms
Developed Appium test suites for iOS and Android
Executed performance and load testing using JMeter and Locust
Maintained automated test execution as part of CI pipelines

employments.title: Senior Test Analyst
key_duties: Owned QA processes across multiple financial services projects
Created API and UI automation frameworks and regression suites
Defined QA KPIs and reporting metrics for stakeholders
Mentored and onboarded new QA engineers
Worked on integrations with HMRC and NS&I

employments.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
key_duties: Performed frontend and backend testing across enterprise systems
Created SQL scripts for test validation and data verification
Automated API testing and maintained regression test suites
Collaborated with globally distributed teams

employments.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
key_duties: Reviewed requirements and supplier documentation
Created detailed test plans and executed regression testing
Used Quality Center for test execution and defect tracking

featuredProject.desc: A comprehensive React application for managing Saturday football league activities, featuring player statistics, match results, season-based organization, and real-time Firebase integration. Built with React 18, Vite, Firebase, and modern development practices.
features: Season-based data management with automatic detection
Player statistics tracking with automatic points calculation
Individual goal and assist tracking system
Admin panel for easy match entry
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
